thread.section_title: RushPassport.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RushPassport.com | rushpassport.com | 2 of 52
thread.title: Peter Z.

author: Peter Z.
title: Peter Z.
text: I was very concerned about the service not being able to meet my close and tight time parameters however the office made miracles happen. I met the owner "Sam" and I truly respect his hands on approach to his business. He personally asked my wife and I if we were ok because he could see our anxiety. I would personally recommend you trust this as a place for amazing service with a personal touch. My passport arrived exactly at the time that I was promised and now my travel plans are back on with no more stress. Many thanks to this wonderful establishment. Its no surprise that this is a successful business model and it's well deserved.
